name: aframe-obj-loader-component
description: A-Frame VR loader component for .OBJ models and .MTL materials.

scripts.dist: webpack browser.js dist/aframe-obj-loader-component.js && webpack -p browser.js dist/aframe-obj-loader-component.min.js
scripts.version: npm run dist && git add -A dist

author: Don McCurdy <dm@donmccurdy.com>
